pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 1, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, May 1, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12 p.m.

2 p.m.    The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4 p.m.    The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with Federally Regulated Employers – Transportation and Communications (FETCO) as part of their annual general meeting.

Adam Room
Château Laurier

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
